files.name: Menubar.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  MenubarRoot,
  type MenubarRootEmits,
  type MenubarRootProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<MenubarRootProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<MenubarRootEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarRoot
    v-bind="forwarded"
    :class="
      cn(
        'flex h-10 items-center gap-x-1 rounded-md border bg-background p-1',
        $attrs.class ?? '',
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </MenubarRoot>
</template>

files.name: MenubarCheckboxItem.vue
MenubarContent.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  MenubarContent,
  type MenubarContentProps,
  MenubarPortal,
  useForwardProps,
} from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = withDefaults(
  defineProps<MenubarContentProps>(),
  {
    align: 'start',
    alignOffset: -4,
    sideOffset: 8,
  },
);

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarPortal>
    <MenubarContent
      v-bind="forwardedProps"
      :class="
        cn(
          'z-50 min-w-48 overflow-hidden rounded-md border bg-popover p-1 text-popover-foreground shadow-md data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95 data-[side=bottom]:slide-in-from-top-2 data-[side=left]:slide-in-from-right-2 data-[side=right]:slide-in-from-left-2 data-[side=top]:slide-in-from-bottom-2',
          $attrs.class ?? '',
        )
      "
    >
      <slot />
    </MenubarContent>
  </MenubarPortal>
</template>

files.name: MenubarItem.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  MenubarItem,
  type MenubarItemEmits,
  type MenubarItemProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<MenubarItemProps & { inset?: boolean }>();
const emits = defineEmits<MenubarItemEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarItem
    v-bind="forwarded"
    :class="cn(
      'relative flex cursor-default select-none items-center rounded-sm px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-hidden focus:bg-secondary focus:text-secondary-foreground data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50',
      inset && 'pl-8',
      $attrs.class ?? '',
    )"
  >
    <slot />
  </MenubarItem>
</template>

MenubarSub.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { MenubarSub, type MenubarSubEmits, useForwardPropsEmits } from 'reka-ui';

interface MenubarSubRootProps {
  defaultOpen?: boolean;
  open?: boolean;
}

const props = defineProps<MenubarSubRootProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<MenubarSubEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarSub v-bind="forwarded">
    <slot />
  </MenubarSub>
</template>

files.name: MenubarSubContent.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import {
  MenubarPortal,
  MenubarSubContent,
  type MenubarSubContentEmits,
  type MenubarSubContentProps,
  useForwardPropsEmits,
} from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<MenubarSubContentProps>();
const emits = defineEmits<MenubarSubContentEmits>();

const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarPortal>
    <MenubarSubContent
      v-bind="forwarded"
      :class="
        cn(
          'z-50 min-w-32 overflow-hidden rounded-md border bg-popover p-1 text-popover-foreground data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95 data-[side=bottom]:slide-in-from-top-2 data-[side=left]:slide-in-from-right-2 data-[side=right]:slide-in-from-left-2 data-[side=top]:slide-in-from-bottom-2',
          $attrs.class ?? '',
        )
      "
    >
      <slot />
    </MenubarSubContent>
  </MenubarPortal>
</template>

files.name: MenubarSubTrigger.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { MenubarSubTrigger, type MenubarSubTriggerProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { ChevronRightIcon } from 'lucide-vue-next';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<MenubarSubTriggerProps & { inset?: boolean }>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarSubTrigger
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    :class="cn(
      'flex cursor-default select-none items-center rounded-sm px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-hidden focus:bg-secondary focus:text-secondary-foreground data-[state=open]:bg-secondary data-[state=open]:text-secondary-foreground',
      inset && 'pl-8',
      $attrs.class ?? '',
    )"
  >
    <slot />
    <ChevronRightIcon class="ml-auto h-4 w-4" />
  </MenubarSubTrigger>
</template>

files.name: MenubarTrigger.vue
files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { MenubarTrigger, type MenubarTriggerProps, useForwardProps } from 'reka-ui';
import { cn } from '@ui/utils';

const props = defineProps<MenubarTriggerProps>();

const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(props);
</script>

<template>
  <MenubarTrigger
    v-bind="forwardedProps"
    :class="
      cn(
        'flex cursor-default select-none items-center rounded-sm px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium outline-hidden focus:bg-secondary focus:text-secondary-foreground data-[state=open]:bg-secondary data-[state=open]:text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/50 hover:transition-bg duration-200',
        $attrs.class ?? '',
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </MenubarTrigger>
</template>
